resources.string: LebDrive is an application that aims to prepare candidates for their theoretical test drive or as we call "Fa7es el Nazare".
LebDrive was fully developed and designed by a university student who, as you are, was not capable of studying for the test through a book.

LebDrive will help you mark your test date and notify you one day prior to it. It also locates the various test centers. In addition, it is available in 3 different languages (Arabic, English and French).

Once you are ready, you can start with the full test. This is the official exam. It consists of 20 random driving law questions and 10 signs questions. You have 15 minutes to complete the test. You must score 25 or above to pass.
This is a signs-only test. You will only be asked on the significance of 30 random signs. Score 25 or above to pass the test.
This is a question-only test. It consists of 30 random questions. You will not be asked on signs. Score 25 or above to pass the test.
